info.description: API pour l'association de baby foot BAB-INSA avec JWT
info.title: BAB-INSA API

post.description: Login with email and password to get JWT tokens
Revoke all refresh tokens for the current user
Get a new access token using refresh token
Register a new user and get JWT tokens
Confirm password reset with token and new password
Send password reset link to user email

get.description: Get recent ELO changes for all players ordered by date (newest first)

parameters.description: Number of ELO changes to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Check if the server is running and database is connected

post.description: Create a new match between two players with automatic ELO calculation and stats update

get.description: Get the N most recent matches ordered by creation date (newest first)

parameters.description: Number of matches to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

patch.description: Update the status of a pending match. Only player2 or admin can confirm/reject.

put.description: Confirm a pending match. Only player2 or admin can confirm.

get.description: Get all players with pagination and sorting options

parameters.description: Number of players per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: pageSize

get.description: Get top N players ordered by ELO rating (highest first)
get.summary: Get top players by ELO rating

parameters.description: Number of players to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get top N players ordered by best win streak (highest first)
get.summary: Get top players by best win streak

parameters.description: Number of players to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get top N players ordered by current win streak (highest first)
get.summary: Get top players by current win streak

parameters.description: Number of players to retrieve (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

get.description: Get player information by player ID
Get ELO rating history for a specific player
Get matches for a specific player, ordered from newest to oldest, with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.description: Number of matches per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: pageSize

get.description: Test endpoint that requires JWT authentication
Get general statistics including total number of players and matches

put.description: Update user email and username (only authenticated user can update their own profile)

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
